definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Some forest fires are caused by sparks.
sentences.chinese: 一些森林火災是由電火花引起的。

sentences.english: A new kind of device has been developed, by which hybrid technology of ultrasonic and WEDM is performed.
sentences.chinese: 開發了一種超聲電火花線切割複合加工裝置。

sentences.english: It had begun as an electrical fire in the Zebra Room, adjacent to the bride's dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 火災是從新娘化妝室旁“斑馬屋”的電火花開始的。

sentences.english: Pulse power supply with micro energy is a core technique for micro-EDM.
sentences.chinese: 微能脈衝電源是微細電火花加工的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: In generally, the machining accuracy is not very high on high-speed wire-EDM machine made in China.
sentences.chinese: 國產快走絲電火花線切割機牀加工精度一般均不高。

sentences.english: Electro-discharge machining is independent of mechanical properties of the workpiece.
sentences.chinese: 電火花加工與工件的機械特性無關。

sentences.english: They jump to a negative charge, making a huge spark called a lightning bolt.
sentences.chinese: 它們跳向負電荷，產生巨大的電火花，叫電閃。

sentences.english: It provides directive meanings to improve the quality of WEDM.
sentences.chinese: 對提高電火花線切割的加工質量有一定的指導意義。

sentences.english: The threshold comparative method in detecting electrospark discharging status is improved.
sentences.chinese: 對檢測電火花放電狀態的閥值比較法作了改進。

sentences.english: In this work, the surface microcracks machined by powder-mixed EDM were researched.
sentences.chinese: 對混粉電火花加工表面的顯微裂紋進行了研究。

sentences.english: Micro electric discharge machine (MEDM) is an important research area in nontraditional material removal processes.
sentences.chinese: 微細電火花加工是特種加工的一個重要研究方向。

sentences.english: This paper focused on the electroforming of the tool electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 研究了採用電鑄技術製備電火花加工工具電極。

sentences.english: The cavity and core were trepanned with frame electrode made of copper wire by EDM.
sentences.chinese: 使用紫銅絲製作線框電極，採用電火花腐蝕方法，以。

sentences.english: But he did not know how to produce one.
sentences.chinese: 但是他不知道該如何製造電火花。

sentences.english: EDM machine has become requisite equipment in the workshop of tools and moulds.
sentences.chinese: 目前電火花加工機牀已成爲工模具車間的必備設備。

sentences.english: This is the third most-signed EDM in history.
sentences.chinese: 這是第三個最簽署的電火花加工的歷史。
